mdRecord.dcterms:title: School of Architecture Student Exhibit, Fall 1993, display board end view and Rotunda
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: An exhibit of student work marking the 250th birthday of Thomas Jefferson, at the south end of the Lawn in front of Old Cabell Hall. Featured innovative display boards that swung perpendicular to their frames. [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: James Murray Howard University of Virginia Historic Buildings and Grounds Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Architecture and City Planning
